Content-Type: text/plain;

Content-Transfer-Encoding: quoted-printable

Gosh, I just wanted to meet Frank in person, and literally see what he
has =
come up with.
That's all. I wasn't suggesting that he jump on the celebrity=
 train.
I would like to see an actual "Frank's box".
I don't know how Darkn=
ess Dave got Frank to go in the first place, but I
am sure
he won't go if h=
e doesn't want to.....
 

________________________________

From: EVP-ITC@y=
ahoogroups.com [mailto:EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com] On Behalf
Of laurie@steuber=
.com
Sent: Thursday, May 07, 2009 4:07 PM
To: EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com
Subje=
ct: Re: [EVP-ITC] Foget that!





 
 
I came into the whole RTSC thing abo=
ut a year ago with nothing except a
photocopied page of directions for hack=
ing the RS-469, an open mind and
willingness to take direction from those w=
ith more experience. I was
lucky if i could put batteries in a radio - and =
a year later I have
three different hacked radios, am comfprtable using EVP=
maker, and am
experimenting with all kinds of methods for getting the best =
results
with RTSC. I still have alot to learn. Every time I have asked ques=
tions
here, someone has answered them. The members of EVP-ITC and RTSC, esp=
.
Bruce and Steve have gone above and beyond in helping me and explaining
t=
hings to me in a way I can understand.
I don't see how meeting Frank at a c=
ircus-type event could be better
than asking him (or any of of us) here!
I =
have been around in the "paranormal field" (for lack of a better term)
for =
a LONG time and I avoid any event that advertises para-celebs.They
are over=
priced and overrated.
They are fan events. period. No one is there to learn=
 anything.
 
I don't blame Frank one bit for not wanting to go. If they rea=
lly wanted
to learn, like we do, then why aren't they here studying like th=
e rest
of us instead of trying to get themselves on TV or get jason and gra=
nt's
autograph?
 
Laurie
-----Original Message-----
From: "Frank Sumption" =
<purplealiengirl@...>
Sent: Thursday, May 7, 2009 3:47pm
To: EVP-ITC@=
yahoogroups.com
Subject: Re: [EVP-ITC] Foget that!


Thing is, I don't like=
 that Hollywood ghost hunter mentality, and having
these shows at "haunted"=
 locations, which I don't think there is
anything haunted, is kinda insulti=
ng. Spirits and entities are
everywhere, and they travel, so the whole para=
normal thing is pretty
much non-sensical to me, but I'm kinda biased in tha=
t way.  The box
would just be a matter of basic electronics. 
 
 Frank-S


=
On Thu, May 7, 2009 at 1:26 PM, Fransen, Debbie
<debbie.fransen@... <=
mailto:debbie.fransen@...> > wrote:




	
	what seems simple to you F=
rank is not simple for some of us.
	Speaking for myself, I don't know anyth=
ing about radios and
speakers
	except to turn it on and off using a button.=
 
	I had to watch the video thats out there to hack my 469 3 times
to make
=
	sure that I was doing it correctly, and I couldn't even tell you
what the =

	hell I did. Now I am trying to figure out how to add all the
other stuff =
(my term)
	to get something similar to what you use, and I just listen to
w=
hat you say in
	this itc group, and the pictures that you put out here.
	I =
even bought a book to try to help me. LOL
	Hell, I don't even remember from=
 school what they taught us
about how
	radios or tvs work for that matter.
=
	If I am the only one then I am just a bigger idiot than I
thought.
	 
	So,=
 some of us need help Frank. That's why I am here.....
	It's important to s=
ome people that you go to some events so that
you can teach...
	Don't be se=
lfish with your mind Frank.... SHARE IT ...... LOL
	deb
	 
	 
	 
	 
	 

___=
_____________________________

	
	From: EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com <mailto:EVP=
-ITC@yahoogroups.com>
[mailto:EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com <mailto:EVP-ITC@yahoo=

Behalf Of Frank Sumption
	
	Sent: Thursday, May 07, 2009 3=
:00 PM 

	To: EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com <mailto:EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com> 
	Su=
bject: Re: [EVP-ITC] Foget that!
	


	
	But it's not I'm somekind of parano=
raml or spirit expert, and
the box--it's just a radio with swept tuning, it=
's like any other method
that supplies the raw audio.
	 
	 Framk-S
	
	
	On =
Thu, May 7, 2009 at 12:27 PM, Fransen, Debbie
<debbie.fransen@... <ma=
ilto:debbie.fransen@...> > wrote:
	



		
		okay, now I know. no name=
s needed.
		Hmmm. I bet no one else thought about the steel ship
problem...=
..
		I was thinking about going just cause it is cheap, and
you were going =
to be there.
		I am sure that I am not alone in hoping that you do
go......=

		I was looking forward to meeting you, and asking you a
BILLION questions=
..... LOL
		However, you are right about the debunkers......
		I think Moon=
 took his ( gift) box (that's what I call
it) because it was given to him a=
s a gift. LOL
		And his box worked ( but, that was on TV)
		 
		PLZ go Fran=
k....You don't go to many of these, and there
are some FS followers who jus=
t
		want to pick your brain....

<mailto:EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com>  [mailto:E=

		 He's listed on the Darkness Radio event site. I didn't
wan=
t to name names becuase i don't trust these dweebs. 
		The event was starti=
ng to smell already. Then, how is
one supposed to get a radio signal inside=
 a stewl ship? The debunkers
would just say see, it doesn't work!
		 
		 Fr=
ank-S

<debbie.fran=
sen@... <mailto:debbie.fransen@...> > wrote:
		



			
			I hea=
r ya Frank.... that's what makes you so
different and interesting.
			You d=
on't want all of this publicity and crap
that most NAMES IN THE PARANORMAL =
field do.
			And the email I received about the Queen Mary
event doesn't sa=
y who is on the engineer panel
			that picks the inventions.
			Who is this=
 debunker on Discovery?  Got a first
or last name?
			Can't think of who yo=
u are talking about...
			 
			deb

 this paranormnal crap, and I don't have
